author: VNExplorer
title: ‚ÄúEst√°n asustados‚Äù: Petro a Duque por propuesta de alianza y candidato √∫nico en 2026
text: El presidente Petro respondi√≥ al expresidente Duque, quien propuso una ‚Äúgran alianza nacional‚Äù y una consulta para definir un candidato √∫nico para enfrentar al petrismo en 2026. El presidente de Colombia, Gustavo Petro, y el expresidente Iv√°n Duque / Foto: Presidencia y EFE. El presidente Gustavo Petro respondi√≥ al expresidente Iv√°n Duque, quien propuso este jueves, desde Cartagena, que se conforme una coalici√≥n de varios sectores, ‚Äúuna gran fuerza ciudadana amplia, que no est√© anclada en ideologismos, sino que tenga como premisa fundamental la protecci√≥n de nuestra democracia‚Äù. El exmandatario lanz√≥ la propuesta desde el Congreso de Asobancaria, en referencia al llamado que tambi√©n ha hecho el expresidente y jefe del Partido Liberal, C√©sar Gaviria, para conformar una coalici√≥n para defender la Constituci√≥n de 1991. (Lea: ‚Äú‚ÄòYo no voy a pedirle al Consejo de Seguridad que avale una constituyente‚Äô: Petro‚Äù) ‚ÄúYo creo que lo que se requiere hoy es que todos aquellos que quieren ser presidente en el 2026 salgan ya de una vez a la palestra y que se empiece a concertar la posibilidad de que Colombia tenga una gran alianza nacional republicana donde, a trav√©s de un mecanismo de consulta, pueda darse la unificaci√≥n de quien puede representar una verdadera alternativa‚Äù, fue la idea que lanz√≥ Duque. Al respecto, el presidente Gustavo Petro se manifest√≥ y le respondi√≥ directamente a Duque a trav√©s de su cuenta de Twitter: ‚ÄúEst√°n asustados‚Äù, fueron sus palabras frente a la ‚Äúgran alianza nacional‚Äù que sugiri√≥ Duque y quien habl√≥ de una propuesta que sea viable para el 2026. De otro lado, Duque expres√≥ este jueves que el gobierno Petro estar√≠a detr√°s de una estrategia para ‚Äútomarse la Corte Constitucional‚Äù. ‚ÄúSi eso llega a ocurrir y no tenemos ah√≠ personas que salvaguarden la Carta del 91, sino que sean estafetas del Gobierno, nuestra democracia y nuestra institucionalidad est√°n en crisis‚Äù, afirm√≥. üëÅ‚Äçüó® Conozca c√≥mo votan los senadores y representantes a la C√°mara en ‚ÄòCongreso a la mano‚Äô. üëâ Lea m√°s sobre el Congreso, el gobierno Petro y otras noticias del mundo pol√≠tico. ‚úâÔ∏è Si tiene inter√©s en los temas pol√≠ticos o informaci√≥n que considere oportuno compartirnos, por favor, escr√≠banos a cualquiera de estos correos: hvalero@elespectador.com; aosorio@elespectador.com; dortega@elespectador.com; dcristancho@elespectador.com; lduarte@elespectador.com; o lperalta@elespectador.com.

author: Max Pilley
title: ASAP Rocky appears in advert for Rihanna‚Äôs Fenty Skin lip balm
text: [ASAP Rocky](https://www.nme.com/artists/asap-rocky) has starred in a new advert for his partner [Rihanna](https://www.nme.com/artists/rihanna)‚Äôs new lip balm product ‚Äì check out the clip below. - READ MORE: [Rihanna: every album ranked and rated](https://www.nme.com/features/rihanna-every-album-ranked-and-rated-2921163) The rapper appears in the promotional video for the Fenty Skin product Lux Balm, which the post describes as ‚Äújuicy, Barbados Cherry-powered lip balm packed with vitamin E and shea butter‚Äù. The footage included in the Instagram post is clipped from the video for Rocky‚Äôs 2023 single ‚Äò [Riot (Rowdy Pipe‚Äôn)](https://www.nme.com/news/music/asap-rocky-reignites-wedding-rumours-after-calling-rihanna-his-wife-on-latest-single-riot-roddy-pipen-3471049)‚Äô. Rocky directly references the lip balm in the lyrics to ‚ÄòRiot (Rowdy Pipe‚Äôn)‚Äô. ‚ÄúNah bitch, this ain‚Äôt lip gloss / Lux Balm up in my palm / New collab with my baby mom,‚Äù he raps. It later transpired that the song shared its name with Rihanna and Rocky‚Äôs second son, Riot Rose Mayers. The song, which was produced by [Pharrell Williams](https://www.nme.com/artists/pharrell-williams), is set to be included on his upcoming fourth studio album ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt Be Dumb‚Äô, which still does not have a release date. In January 2023, [Rocky said that the album was ‚Äúfinished‚Äù](https://www.nme.com/news/music/aap-rocky-releases-new-single-same-problems-says-fourth-album-is-finished-listen-3383510) when he shared his single ‚ÄòSame Problems?‚Äô. Rocky‚Äôs last studio album was 2018‚Äôs ‚Äò [Testing](https://www.nme.com/news/music/asap-rocky-drops-new-album-testing-featuring-frank-ocean-skepta-lauryn-hill-2324944)‚Äô, which included the singles ‚ÄòASAP Forever‚Äô and ‚ÄòPraise the Lord (Da Shine)‚Äô. [Reports emerged last August that Rihanna and Rocky had welcomed their second child together](https://www.nme.com/news/music/rihanna-and-aap-rocky-reportedly-welcome-second-child-together-3486394). It was later confirmed that Riot had been born on August 1. [Rihanna had previously announced she was expecting another baby during her Super Bowl Halftime Show performance](https://www.nme.com/news/music/fans-speculate-rihanna-pregnant-again-super-bowl-halftime-show-3397165) in Glendale, Arizona back in February. Also last year, [Wu-Tang Clan](https://www.nme.com/artists/wu-tang-clan) rapper [RZA](https://www.nme.com/artists/rza) responded to [Rihanna and ASAP Rocky naming their firstborn after him](https://www.nme.com/news/music/rza-reacts-to-rihanna-and-aap-rocky-naming-their-baby-after-him-its-a-great-honour-3466335). RZA Athelaston Mayers was born on May 10, 2022.

author: Techdows
title: UMB Bank n.a. Increases Stake in ExlService Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:EXLS)
text:
UMB Bank n.a. increased its holdings in shares of ExlService Holdings, Inc. (
NASDAQ:EXLS ‚Äì Free Report) by 453.5% during the 3rd quarter, according to the company in its most recent 13F filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission. The firm owned 1,987 shares of the business services provider‚Äôs stock after buying an additional 1,628 shares during the period. UMB Bank n.a.‚Äôs holdings in ExlService were worth $56,000 at the end of the most recent quarter.
Several other large investors have also recently added to or reduced their stakes in EXLS. Bank of Montreal Can increased its stake in ExlService by 17.3% during the 1st quarter. Bank of Montreal Can now owns 13,693 shares of the business services provider‚Äôs stock worth $1,976,000 after buying an additional 2,020 shares during the period. MetLife Investment Management LLC grew its holdings in ExlService by 54.1% during the 1st quarter. MetLife Investment Management LLC now owns 17,536 shares of the business services provider‚Äôs stock worth $2,512,000 after acquiring an additional 6,159 shares in the last quarter. Rhumbline Advisers grew its holdings in ExlService by 4.1% during the 1st quarter. Rhumbline Advisers now owns 89,554 shares of the business services provider‚Äôs stock worth $12,830,000 after acquiring an additional 3,535 shares in the last quarter. BlackRock Inc. grew its holdings in ExlService by 1.4% during the 1st quarter. BlackRock Inc. now owns 5,054,281 shares of the business services provider‚Äôs stock worth $724,125,000 after acquiring an additional 67,935 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Westwood Holdings Group Inc. acquired a new position in ExlService during the 1st quarter worth approximately $264,000. 18.96% of the stock is owned by hedge funds and other institutional investors.
Analysts Set New Price Targets
EXLS has been the subject of several analyst reports. Jefferies Financial Group initiated coverage on shares of ExlService in a report on Tuesday, September 19th. They set a ‚Äúhold‚Äù rating and a $33.00 price target for the company. Wedbush reiterated a ‚Äúneutral‚Äù rating and set a $34.00 price target on shares of ExlService in a report on Thursday, December 14th.
StockNews.com cut shares of ExlService from a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating to a ‚Äúhold‚Äù rating in a report on Saturday. Finally, Citigroup lowered their target price on shares of ExlService from $32.40 to $32.00 and set a ‚Äúneutral‚Äù rating for the company in a report on Monday, October 16th. Four analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and three have assigned a buy rating to the company. According to MarketBeat, ExlService presently has a consensus rating of ‚ÄúHold‚Äù and a consensus price target of $35.43.
Read Our Latest Report on ExlService
ExlService Stock Down 0.3 %
EXLS stock opened at $30.85 on Monday. The company has a fifty day moving average price of $28.29 and a 200 day moving average price of $29.71. ExlService Holdings, Inc. has a 12 month low of $25.17 and a 12 month high of $35.94. The company has a market cap of $5.09 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 29.61, a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 1.74 and a beta of 0.99. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.19, a current ratio of 2.13 and a quick ratio of 2.13.
ExlService (
NASDAQ:EXLS ‚Äì Get Free Report) last released its quarterly earnings results on Thursday, October 26th. The business services provider reported $0.30 EPS for the quarter, beating the consensus estimate of $0.28 by $0.02. ExlService had a net margin of 11.07% and a return on equity of 23.66%. The firm had revenue of $410.97 million during the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $405.68 million. Sell-side analysts expect that ExlService Holdings, Inc. will post 1.14 earnings per share for the current year.
ExlService Company Profile
ExlService Holdings, Inc operates as a data analytics, and digital operations and solutions company in the United States and internationally. It operates through Insurance, Healthcare, Analytics, and Emerging Business segments. The company provides digital operations and solutions and analytics-driven services, such as claims processing, premium and benefit administration, agency management, account reconciliation, policy research, underwriting support, new business acquisition, policy servicing, premium audit, surveys, billing and collection, commercial and residential survey, and customer service using digital technology, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and advanced automation; digital customer acquisition services using a software-as-a-service delivery model through LifePRO and LISS platforms; subrogation services; and Subrosource software platform, an end-to-end subrogation platform.

author: Admin
title: Burkina Faso : Une base terroriste d√©truite √† Tia, des criminels neutralis√©s √† Tialboanga ‚Äì NetAfrique.net
text: Les Forces combattantes, avec l‚Äôappui des vecteurs a√©riens, ont d√©cim√© plusieurs terroristes ce jeudi, dans la for√™t de Tia (Boucle du Mouhoun) et √† Tialboanga (Est), a appris l‚ÄôAIB aupr√®s de sources s√©curitaires. Gr√¢ce aux vols de reconnaissance, une base terroriste nich√©e dans la for√™t de Tia, √† 12 km de Bondoukuy (Mouhoun, Boucle du Mouhoun), a √©t√© d√©couverte le jeudi 28 d√©cembre 2023. Les pilotes ont rep√©r√© un nombre important de criminels se rassemblant sous un arbre touffu. Au moment opportun, les veilleurs du ciel ont envoy√© des frappes cibl√©es sur les assaillants, qui ont br√ªl√© avec leurs √©quipements. Les unit√©s terrestres du 10e bataillon d‚Äôintervention rapide sont intervenues imm√©diatement pour encercler la for√™t. Tous les rescap√©s ont √©t√© √©limin√©s, et la base ainsi que toute la logistique ont √©t√© d√©truites. Outre la for√™t de Tia, plusieurs terroristes ont √©t√© signal√©s dans la matin√©e du jeudi 28 d√©cembre 2023 aux environs de Tialboanga, √† 7 km de Sakoani dans la zone de Matiacoali (Gourma, Est). Pendant qu‚Äôils prenaient le th√© et discutaient certainement de leurs prochaines cibles, ces malfaiteurs ignoraient que c‚Äô√©tait leur derni√®re r√©union de planification. Un missile l√¢ch√© depuis le ciel les a consum√©s avec leurs logistiques. Selon nos sources, les op√©rations de reconqu√™te de l‚Äôint√©grit√© territoriale se poursuivent. Agence d‚ÄôInformation du Burkina (AIB) NB: photo d‚Äôarchive et d‚Äôillustration

author: Sommer Stockton
title: Niman Ranch Names 2024 Sustainable Farm Of The Year
text:
Niman Ranch has recognized the Hundling family of Breda, Iowa, as the 2024 Sustainable Farm of the Year.
This accolade honors the Hundlings for their land stewardship and ongoing commitment to the principles of regenerative agriculture.
For Brice and Melanie Hundling, sustainability isn‚Äôt just a buzzword. Their multi-species, biodiverse farm is a model of sustainable practices, from cover crops and rotational grazing to no-till crop farming and edible windbreaks that build soil health and provide sustenance for humans and wildlife alike. The Hundlings regularly experiment with new regenerative practices and share what they‚Äôve learned with other farmers in the Niman Ranch farmer network and the broader agricultural community through field days and case studies.
Hundling Family Farm The Hundlings have been producing hogs for Niman Ranch since 2005 and began selling Angus cattle to Niman Ranch in 2019. The family appreciates the economic sustainability of knowing who will be buying their livestock and at what price. That security allows them to continue improving their land and soil by raising other livestock and poultry species, including goats, sheep, laying hens and broilers, turkeys, ducks, geese, peacocks and guinea fowl.
They also farm alfalfa, corn, soybeans and oats, which provide feed and bedding for the animals. They seed rye for cover crops each year, of which they harvest some for seed and straw; the rest is grazed by their ruminants. It‚Äôs all one system of grazing livestock in rotation with the crops that keeps the soil fertile, the animals healthy, the water clean, the ecosystem thriving and the farm successful.
[ RELATED: 2022 Sustainable Farm Of The Year Recognized By Niman Ranch ]
The farm is currently part of a pilot program with Nofence , the first virtual fencing system for multispecies livestock operations. The technology allows for the rotational grazing of goats, sheep and cattle on cover crops with reduced costs for labor and fencing.
The Hundlings also live as sustainably as possible, feeding their family of five kids from the farm with their garden, dairy cows, eggs, fruit trees and meats. They are raising their children to appreciate the importance of stewardship of the land and humane treatment of the animals they raise, and they hope that one or more of them will someday want to continue their work on the farm.
‚ÄúWe congratulate the Hundling family for this well-deserved award,‚Äù said Chris Oliviero, Niman Ranch‚Äôs general manager. ‚ÄúTheir commitment to diversity on the farm, integrating livestock on the land and combining traditional and innovative practices to build resilience are notable. We‚Äôre proud to have the Hundlings a part of the Niman Ranch farmer network.‚Äù

author: Emilioekpt
title: The Ultimate Guide to English Payment Integration Solutions
text:
In the evolving business environment, an efficient payment integration solution is more than a mere necessity. It's the bridge that connects businesses to their customers, facilitating seamless transactions. Today, we delve into the world of English payment integration solutions, illuminating how they foster business growth, improve customer experiences, and promote overall transactional efficiency.
2. Understanding Payment Integration
Payment integration is the process of incorporating a payment gateway into a business‚Äôs digital platform, be it a website, online store, or mobile app. This integration allows businesses to receive payments directly from customers, paving the way for a smoother, more streamlined e-commerce experience.
3. Why Payment Integration is Crucial for Your Business
In the digital age, having a reliable payment integration solution can be the difference between success and failure. It enhances customer satisfaction by providing a swift, secure, and efficient payment process. Moreover, it reduces the risk of cart abandonment, boosts sales, and contributes significantly to business growth.
4. Key Features of an Excellent Payment Integration Solution
A superior payment integration solution should offer:
‚Ä¢ Security: To protect sensitive information from cyber threats.
‚Ä¢ Compatibility: It should easily integrate with your website or app.
‚Ä¢ Multiple Payment Options: To accommodate customer preferences.
‚Ä¢ Speed: For quick and efficient transactions.
‚Ä¢ Reliable Customer Support: For addressing any technical issues or queries.
5. Top English Payment Integration Solutions
English payment integration solutions have seen rapid advancements in recent years, with several providers offering diverse capabilities. Below, we explore some of the most effective options.
5.1. PayPal
A global leader, PayPal offers a robust payment integration solution with multi-currency support, making it ideal for businesses looking to reach international customers. It provides an intuitive interface, exceptional security measures, and excellent customer support.
5.2. Stripe
Stripe has gained popularity due to its comprehensive API, allowing businesses to customize their payment process extensively. It supports a wide array of payment options and currencies, promoting a seamless customer experience.
5.3. Worldpay
A major player in the UK, Worldpay caters to businesses of all sizes. It's lauded for its robust fraud detection capabilities, diverse payment options, and competitive rates.
6. Advantages of English Payment Integration Solutions
These solutions offer numerous benefits, including:
‚Ä¢ Increased Sales: By offering a smooth, seamless payment process, businesses can significantly boost their conversion rates.
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Security: Top-tier solutions come with state-of-the-art security measures, ensuring safe transactions.
‚Ä¢ Better User Experience: A streamlined payment process improves the overall customer journey, encouraging repeat business.
7. How to Integrate a Payment Gateway
Integrating a payment gateway into your platform typically involves the following steps:
1. Choose a Payment Gateway: Consider your business requirements, customer preferences, and budget.
2. Create a Merchant Account: This account allows you to accept payments.
3. Integration: Use the API or SDK provided by the gateway provider to integrate the payment solution into your platform.
8. Potential Challenges in Payment Integration
While integrating a payment solution, you may face challenges related to security, compatibility, transaction failures, and hidden fees. It's crucial to conduct thorough research, compare various providers, and seek expert advice to avoid potential pitfalls.
9. Future of Payment Integration Solutions
With emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, the future of payment integration solutions looks promising. These technologies can enhance security, speed, and efficiency, fundamentally changing how businesses process payments.
10. Conclusion
English payment integration solutions have revolutionized the business landscape, enabling companies to provide swift, secure, and efficient transaction experiences. By understanding the importance of these solutions, their features, advantages, and potential challenges, businesses can make informed decisions, driving growth and customer satisfaction. The future holds exciting possibilities for payment integration, making it an essential aspect for any business aspiring to thrive in the digital era.

author: WilsonT
title: A Year of World War One - 2023 Round-up news - IndieDB
text: 2023 has been a great year for the WW1 Game Series, with Christmas Truce and Wolf Truce events returning in Verdun and Tannenberg, and Verdun appearing in a French museum exhibit. The series also celebrated our 10 year anniversary - Verdun entered Early Access in 2013! Isonzo especially has had a good year - starting off by winning the IndieDB Indie of the Year 2022 award, thanks to your generous votes! For our part, we made sure to implement masses of new content. From our first big expansion with the Piave map all the way to a snowy end to the year with the White War release, the game has grown substantially! - 4 Huge New Maps! - 8 New Weapons! - 2 Cosmetic DLC Packs! - Mac Support! - Much more! If you haven't yet felt the crunch of Alpine snow beneath your boots, Isonzo is currently 67% off [on Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1556790/Isonzo/) with DLC up to 30% off until January 4th. Meanwhile [on PlayStation](https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002709/) you can get the Collector's Edition 67% off and the Second Wave DLC pack 30% off until January 6th! Four New Battlefields for Isonzo! Piave - Caporetto Offensive Grappa - Caporetto Offensive Piana - Mountain War Offensive Marmolada - White War Offensive Upwards and onwards! We completed a lot of our roadmap milestones in 2023 just as planned, and there are plenty more coming in 2024! There'll be a new map, more weapons, additional cosmetic DLC packs... and a special game mode! We're maintaining radio silence about the new game mode for now, but keep your ears to the ground and you might pick up some teasers. Marmolada Video Dev Blog Go behind the scenes with map designer Kian as he discusses the creation of Marmolada in [this YouTube video](https://youtu.be/9Y1Is925m4c?si=5f8x4Bp8Ngc7v0IP) - including almost 1000 reference images! Verdun at the Museum In the aisles of the History Center of the Notre-Dame-de-Lorette Memorial'14-18 you‚Äôll be able to find a special exhibition! The War games. Playing with History exhibit allows visitors to immerse themselves into WW1 history, by having 10 games available to play. We‚Äôre very pleased that Verdun is one of those games! The exhibit runs until May 2024, and entry to the museum and exhibition are both free. If you‚Äôre in the area, check it out! Christmas Truce The Christmas Truce is live once again in Verdun, and you‚Äôre able to participate in multiple activities together with other soldiers who joined the Christmas Truce. Join a friendly match of football, have a snowball fight or just take a nice relaxing stroll and enjoy the winter scenery. The Truce event runs until January 7th! Wolves in Tannenberg! In October, the wolves returned to the forests of Tannenberg, asking the question: would you cease fire with your human foes to battle a new enemy? Some of you will have managed to hold a successful truce to fight off the canine aggressors, and others, not so much. Last but definitely not least... thank you! We're extremely grateful for all the support from our great community this year, and it's been wonderful to see people enjoying themselves with our games. We can't wait to show you what we have planned for 2024! On that note, we'll end with a little WIP image...

author: Kathryn Brenzel
title: Fairstead, Will Blodgett Both Declare Win in Ongoing Legal Fight
text:
Affordable housing giant Fairstead and partner-turned-competitor Will Blodgett have been locked in a messy divorce for over three years. Who won arbitration? It depends on who you ask.
An April 2 decision says affordable housing giant Fairstead ‚Äúsubstantially prevailed,‚Äù and agreed with claims that the firm‚Äôs former co-founder Blodgett plotted to take over the company before he was fired and launched competitor Tredway. But after the decision, Blodgett expects to walk away with tens of millions of dollars.
Blodgett‚Äôs legal team sees the decision, along with an earlier one out of a Delaware court, as a decisive win related to his claim that Fairstead is wrongfully denying him a portion of the firm‚Äôs profits.
Fairstead, however, argues that a court in Delaware will make that determination ‚Äî and that the arbitration decision is a resounding victory for the company. The arbiter, after all, agreed that Blodgett misused the company‚Äôs proprietary information and enlisted other employees in a plan to take control of the company.
One point of agreement: The fight between Blodgett and Fairstead is far from over.
Fairstead, which was founded in 2013 by Jefrey Goldberg, Stuart Feldman and Blodgett, now has $7.8 billion in assets and projects in the pipeline and more than 25,000 housing units across 28 states. As the company rapidly grew over the years, Blodgett and other employees grew increasingly frustrated that they couldn‚Äôt share directly in the company‚Äôs success through equity stakes.
Most of Blodgett‚Äôs compensation consisted of carried interest, or a portion of the profits from the company‚Äôs special-purpose property ownership subsidiaries. Frustration over the compensation schema led to discussions about restructuring the company, which the arbitrator characterized as Blodgett‚Äôs attempts to take control of the firm.
By September 2021, Blodgett was terminated, and Fairstead indicated that his interest in the subsidiaries would be canceled. Blodgett filed a lawsuit in response, alleging that Fairstead wrongfully deprived him of tens of millions of dollars in profits after he left and started a new firm, Tredway. In a countersuit, Fairstead accused Blodgett of a conspiracy to drive out the other two leaders at Fairstead and downloading a trove of the company‚Äôs documents with the intent to take control of Fairstead or form his own firm.
The company cited these activities as its reasons for firing Blodgett and depriving him of carried interest.
The April 2 decision shot down Blodgett‚Äôs argument that he was fired from Fairstead in September 2021 without reason. Arbitrator Kathleen Roberts found that, in his quest to control Fairstead or create a spinoff firm, Blodgett violated the firm‚Äôs confidentiality terms and his fiduciary duties as an employee. She pointed to the fact that Blodgett forwarded internal Fairstead documents to the family offices of his in-laws, the Tisch and Sussman families, ‚Äúfor the purposes of aiding his takeover plans, or if that failed, his new venture efforts.‚Äù
Roberts described Blodgett as ‚Äúdetermined if not obsessed‚Äù with taking control of Fairstead, minimizing the role of Feldman and Goldberg or alternatively, forming a separate entity funded by ‚Äúthe family offices of his billionaire in-laws.‚Äù
The decision also, however, stated that ‚ÄúBlodgett is entitled to a declaration‚Ä¶ that the Employment Agreement does not entitle any Respondent to cancel Blodgett‚Äôs entire interests.‚Äù Instead, his violation of the employment agreement means he must ‚Äúforfeit his interests in pending transactions.‚Äù
A February decision out of a Delaware court found that provisions of operating agreements governing the special-purpose property ownership subsidiaries ‚Äú[do] not provide an affirmative termination or forfeiture right‚Äù related to Blodgett‚Äôs interests.
‚ÄúThe core issue in this case is straightforward: Did Fairstead have the right to take Mr. Blodgett‚Äôs equity? The legal system has answered with a resounding no,‚Äù Jacob Buchdal, an attorney for Blodgett, said in a statement. ‚ÄúMr. Blodgett won, as both the Arbitrator and the Delaware Chancery Court have ruled in his favor and made it clear that Fairstead had no right to appropriate tens of millions of dollars of his equity. That fact is indisputable.‚Äù
Fairstead does dispute it, pointing to the fact that the Delaware decision did not address two other ongoing claims related to the operating agreements. It expects the forfeiture of Blodgett‚Äôs interests to be addressed later in court.
‚ÄúWe are pleased that the arbitrator found that Mr. Blodgett engaged in widespread misconduct including outright theft of Fairstead‚Äôs property and breaches of his fiduciary duties,‚Äù Michael Carlinksy, an attorney for Fairstead, said in a statement. ‚ÄúThe Arbitrator forfeited his pending interests and further consequences of his conduct, including forfeiture of his other interests, will be addressed in subsequent court proceedings.‚Äù
The arbitrator indicated that while Fairstead did not prevail on all of its claims, it should be awarded attorneys‚Äô fees because it ‚Äúsubstantially prevailed on the critical claims and issues presented in arbitration.‚Äù The fees will be calculated according to attorney services related to Fairstead‚Äôs successful claims.
Still, the arbitrator rejected Fairstaid‚Äôs claim that Blodgett owed the company more than $34 million for failing to disclose a business opportunity in the form of an off-market transaction in March 2022. The decision also found that Fairstead did not prove that Blodgett ‚Äúused Fairstead‚Äôs information to obtain an advantage over competitor,‚Äù or tried to usurp the company‚Äôs business opportunities.

author: Contributing Editor
title: More High Surf, Dangerous Rip Currents Expected at LA, OC Beaches
text:
Large waves will continue to pound the Southern California coast Friday and into the weekend, raising the risk of flooding while creating dangerous conditions for anyone entering the ocean water.
National Weather Service forecasters said there were reports of waves reaching 16 feet in Los Angeles County Thursday. As a result, a high surf advisory that had been issued for L.A. County beaches until 10 p.m. Saturday was upgraded to a high surf warning, with waves of 8 to 13 feet anticipated, and some isolated sets possibly reaching 20 feet.
‚ÄúThese are forecast to be extremely dangerous conditions, as powerful waves and life-threatening rip currents pose an exceptional risk of ocean drowning and damage to coastal structures such as piers and jetties,‚Äù according to the NWS. ‚ÄúImpacts will only slightly lessen into Friday ‚Äî before an additional strong wave front arrives from the NW, reinforcing extremely dangerous conditions at the beaches again on Saturday.‚Äù
Forecasters said the highest surf is anticipated at west-facing beaches such as Hermosa, Manhattan and Palos Verdes.
A coastal flooding advisory will also be in effect until 10 p.m. Saturday for Los Angeles County beaches, including the Malibu coast and Catalina Island.
‚ÄúFlooding of sea water is likely, around the time of high tide, over vulnerable low-lying coastal areas such as parking lots, beaches, and walkways,‚Äù according to the NWS. ‚ÄúSignificant damage to roads or structures is NOT expected. There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.‚Äù
In Orange County, a high surf warning and coastal flood advisory will be in effect until 2 a.m. Monday. Forecasters said Orange County beaches will see waves of 6 to 12 feet, with sets of up to 15 feet in northern Orange County.
Forecasters said the area could receive some light to moderate rain Friday night into Saturday, and there‚Äôs a chance of some light rain Sunday. According to the NWS, there is a ‚Äúslight chance of light rain in Pasadena on New Year‚Äôs Eve and New Year‚Äôs Day,‚Äù when the Rose Parade will make its way along Colorado Boulevard.
